original_text: Addressing these questions, as elaborated in this report, will ensure the dashboard is a valuable tool for optimizing the UBP model and fostering stronger customer relationships.
units: Addressing these questions , as elaborated in this report , will ensure the dashboard is a valuable tool for optimizing the UBP model and fostering stronger customer relationships .

original_text: Similarly, the stated purpose – "This dashboard will provide insights into customer usage of our platform to inform pricing strategy and customer engagement" – directly aligns with the title and clearly articulates the dashboard's objectives.
units: Similarly , the stated purpose – " This dashboard will provide insights into customer usage of our platform to inform pricing strategy and customer engagement " – directly aligns with the title and clearly articulates the dashboard 's objectives .

original_text: The specific definition will depend on the nature of the platform and how value is delivered to the user.
units: The specific definition will depend on the nature of the platform and how value is delivered to the user .
how value is delivered to the user

original_text: Providing users with the ability to export the underlying data allows them to conduct further analysis in their preferred tools, share insights with stakeholders who may not have direct access to the dashboard, and integrate the data with other business intelligence systems.
units: Providing users with the ability to export the underlying data allows them to conduct further analysis in their preferred tools , share insights with stakeholders who may not have direct access to the dashboard , and integrate the data with other business intelligence systems .
integrate the data with other business intelligence systems

original_text:
Implementing a robust RBAC system not only protects sensitive data but also streamlines user access management and ensures that different teams have access to the information they need to effectively perform their roles.28


D. How should usage be defined and measured for each feature/endpoint?
Establishing clear and consistent definitions and measurement methodologies for usage across all features and endpoints is fundamental to the accuracy and effectiveness of the usage-based pricing dashboard.6
